column2: "There sure are a lot of Darkers around now. I don't think I've ever seen them this numerous before."
"You know, folks used to say that if you saw one Darker, there were a hundred more nearby."
"But for the past ten years, things have been pretty quiet. I wonder just what changed?"
"They don't talk, so we can't ask them what they're after. But with that many, whatever it is can't be good."
"Even at the best of times, those things are creepy. We ARKS should be on our guard when they're around."
